OrgName.entry: SHIRE BROOK VALLEY WILDLIFE WATCH GROUP

Desc.entry: Runs environmental activity sessions for children at Shire Brook Valley Nature Reserve. The sessions are aimed at children aged 8-14 years who are keen to learn more about nature and its conservation. Runs in partnership with the Parks and Countryside Ranger Service and Sheffield Wildlife Trust. All group leaders are volunteers and have undergone training with the Wildlife Trust. A small voluntary contribution per session is requested.
